step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arms straight and fingers open as you begin to stretch overhead.
Nice stretch overhead! Ensure your fingers are spread wide.
Great job making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles during this phase.
Excellent! As you stretch your arms back overhead, focus on exhaling and relaxing your muscles.
Well done on completing the first repetition. Keep up the good form!
Second repetition starting strong! Maintain that comfortable posture and begin stretching your arms overhead with fingers open.
Good overhead stretch. Keep those fingers spread wide as you prepare for the next movement.
Excellent fist and shoulder blade squeeze. Remember to inhale and engage your muscles fully.
Nicely done extending arms overhead while exhaling and relaxing. You're doing great!
Fantastic! You've completed both repetitions with good form. Keep practicing these movements to build strength and promote lymph drainage.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers spread wide when stretching overhead and to really squeeze your shoulder blades together when making a fist. Continue to focus on your breathing during each phase.
